Invocation Name: heartlites christmas
Developer Terms of Use
des: Heartlites Christmas, a Columbus radio tradition where Christmas music comes alive. This is the radio station where Santa lives and his Christmas classics and Christmas songs fill your speakers with Chrismas Joy. Heartlites is Columbus Ohio's Christmas Station in November and December. So go ahead, turn on some Christmas music, grab some hot cocoa, follow us on Facebook and let us keep you entertained all season long
priv:
